ThingDef.label: Coke furnace
ThingDef.description: A huge inert furnace that produces coking coal and creosote.

ThingDef.label: Stone furnace
ThingDef.description: A large stone furnace that runs on solid fuel. The design is primitive and consumes a lot of fuel, and also uses manual labor.

ThingDef.label: Anvil
ThingDef.description: A massive metal anvil used to make simple tools and weapons, as well as armor.

ThingDef.label: Steam crusher
ThingDef.description: A large and complex mechanism based on steam traction. Designed for grinding ore or other items.

ThingDef.label: Steam multismelter
ThingDef.description: A huge and complex mechanism powered by steam. The machine is designed to create alloys from powders.

ThingDef.label: Steam multismelter
ThingDef.description: Complete machine for compression, stretching and forming blanks. The forge can autonomously produce various industrial goods.

ThingDef.label: Steam miner
ThingDef.description: A machine capable of mining rocks on the planet's surface. The miner only works within the assigned radius, following your mining orders.

ThingDef.label: Shallow ore drill
ThingDef.description: Steam-powered drilling machine for mining at a shallow depth below the surface of the planet. Build a mineral scanner to see the location of minerals underground.

ThingDef.label: Steam drill
ThingDef.description: Steam-powered drilling machine for mining at a deep depth below the surface of the planet. Build a advanced mineral scanner to see the location of minerals underground.

ThingDef.label: Steam mixer
ThingDef.description: A simple and efficient machine for producing various mixtures on an industrial scale.

ThingDef.label: Steam oven
ThingDef.description: A machine that can replace a cook. Consumes water and steam to produce food for you.

ThingDef.label: Steam farm
ThingDef.description: Automatic plant growing machine. Consumes steam, water and seeds to work.

ThingDef.label: Composter
ThingDef.description: A mechanism for producing compost from raw materials over time.

ThingDef.label: Electrolyzer
ThingDef.description: The electrolysis method allows you to get chlorine and restore metals by applying current.

ThingDef.label: Automaton factory
ThingDef.description: A large machine for the production and configuration of automatons for work.

ThingDef.label: fueled stove
ThingDef.description: A wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: stonecutter's table
ThingDef.description: A work table with saws and chisels for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste dispenser
ThingDef.description: A machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.

ThingDef.label: hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.

ThingDef.label: Chemical plant
ThingDef.description: Chemical plant for the production of liquid fuels.

ThingDef.label: drug lab
ThingDef.description: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.

ThingDef.label: machining table
ThingDef.description: A work station for assembling machinery like guns and ammunition, or breaking down dead mechanoids.

ThingDef.label: electric stove
ThingDef.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: Prosthetics machine
ThingDef.description: A machine for assembling prostheses with a complete set of necessary tools.

ThingDef.label: electric smithy
ThingDef.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.

ThingDef.label: Waste recycler
ThingDef.description: Machine for chemical treatment and extraction of chlorine from waste. If the chlorine tanks overflow, the area will be contaminated.

ThingDef.label: electric tailor bench
ThingDef.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.

ThingDef.label: Weaving factory
ThingDef.description: Steam mechanical factory for the production of fabrics. The functionality is too small for tailoring.

ThingDef.label: electric smelter
ThingDef.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: hi-tech research bench
ThingDef.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Allows more rapid research, and unlocks advanced research projects.

ThingDef.label: steam crematorium
ThingDef.description: A huge stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with extremely high temperatures.

ThingDef.label: fabrication bench
ThingDef.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing technological marvels from simpler materials.
